# Establish the minimum CMake version
# This ensures the following CMake functions are run with a compatible
# version of CMake
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.10)

# This command specifies the project name
project(SimpleMake VERSION 1.0)

# Set the C++ Standard to C++11
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 11)
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD_REQUIRED True)

# Add a autogenerated Configuration File to contain the Version String
configure_file(SimpleMakeConfig.h.in SimpleMakeConfig.h)

# Create a variable to contain the source files
set(SIMPLE_MAKE_SRC
    main.cpp)

# This command tells CMake to create an executable using the specified source code files
add_executable(SimpleMake 
               ${SIMPLE_MAKE_SRC}
               )

# Link in the Configuration File
target_include_directories(SimpleMake PUBLIC
                           "${PROJECT_BINARY_DIR}"
                           )
